--- title: lambdaSdk keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "easy invoking lambda functions" description: "easy invoking lambda functions" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

written on top of boto3, for the shortest way to invoke aws lambda functions

Install

pip install lambdasdk

How to use

prepare

Create user and set up creds

If not on aws, you need to create iam account and map the following keys

user and pw

if not on aws 
user = aws_access_key_id
pw = aws_secret_access_key
if run on aws 
user = None
pw = None
{% raw %} 
from lambdasdk.lambdasdk import Lambda
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lambda_ = Lambda(
    user = USER,
    pw = PW,
    region = 'ap-southeast-1'
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
lambda_.invoke(
    functionName= 'lambda-pip' ,
    input = input, 
    invocationType= 'RequestResponse' 
)
